cast.overview: Princess Leia is captured and held hostage by the evil Imperial forces in their effort to take over the galactic Empire. Venturesome Luke Skywalker and dashing captain Han Solo team together with the loveable robot duo R2-D2 and C-3PO to rescue the beautiful princess and restore peace and justice in the Empire.
cast.title: Star Wars

details.biography: Pam Rose is known as an Actor and Model. She began modeling at the young age of 18 and went on to become an air hostess and then a manager in casinos which took her all over the world.  It was while she was working in a casino in Brighton in 1968 that she was offered her first film role in Oh! What a Lovely War doing crowd scenes, standing in and doubling for actors. She then joined a casting agency, Central Casting, which started her on the road to a busy film and TV career spanning over forty years.
details.name: Pam Rose
